prompt.example: Example: "Replace the man with Naruto", "Turn this into a classic 90s anime style", "Dress the girl in a floral dress"

ui.characterInfoPlaceholder: Enter character background, story, or description...

hogwartsSorting.q1: Your OC stumbles upon a mysterious door in a dark forest. What do they do?
hogwartsSorting.a1_1: Kick it open. Whatever's inside better be ready.
hogwartsSorting.a1_2: Examine the lock first. There's always a way in without brute force.
hogwartsSorting.a1_3: Study the runes on the door. The answer is in the symbols.
hogwartsSorting.a1_4: Knock politely. You never know who might need help inside.
hogwartsSorting.q2: A powerful enemy appears! How does your character fight?
hogwartsSorting.a2_2: Strike their weakness. Victory requires strategy.
hogwartsSorting.a2_3: Analyze their pattern first. Knowledge is the ultimate weapon.
hogwartsSorting.a2_4: Protect allies first. No one fights alone.
hogwartsSorting.q3: Your OC enters a room with four magical items. Which calls to them?
hogwartsSorting.a3_1: A blazing sword that burns brighter when facing fear
hogwartsSorting.a3_2: An ancient crown that reveals others' true intentions
hogwartsSorting.a3_3: A book containing all the world's forgotten secrets.
hogwartsSorting.a3_4: A seed that can grow into anything the heart truly needs.
hogwartsSorting.q4: Your character overhears a dangerous secret. What do they do?
hogwartsSorting.a4_1: Expose it immediately. The truth must be known.
hogwartsSorting.a4_2: Keep it. Information is power for the right moment.
hogwartsSorting.a4_3: Investigate further. One piece isn't the whole puzzle.
hogwartsSorting.a4_4: Tell only those who need protection from it.
hogwartsSorting.q5: A magical being grants your OC one wish. What do they choose?
hogwartsSorting.a5_1: The strength to protect everyone I love.
hogwartsSorting.a5_2: The power to achieve my greatest ambitions.
hogwartsSorting.a5_3: The wisdom to understand all mysteries.
hogwartsSorting.a5_4: The ability to bring happiness to others.

title: Convert to Anime
infoTooltip: Supports photos, 3D renders, screenshots & comic panels

results.title: Conversion Results
results.empty: Your anime conversions will appear here

deleteModal.title: Delete Confirmation
deleteModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete this image? This action cannot be undone.

styleDescriptions.anime: Classic Japanese animation style with vibrant colors and expressive features
styleDescriptions.ghibliAnime: Whimsical and detailed animation style inspired by Studio Ghibli films
styleDescriptions.koreanManhwa: Colorful webtoon style with flowing panels and detailed character designs
styleDescriptions.cartoon: Simplified, exaggerated style with bold outlines and flat colors
styleDescriptions.manga: Black and white Japanese comic style with distinctive panel layouts and expressive line work
styleDescriptions.inkWash: Traditional East Asian painting style with flowing ink gradients
styleDescriptions.chibi: Small, chibi character in different moods
styleDescriptions.simpsons: The Simpsons style with bold outlines and flat colors
styleDescriptions.rickAndMorty: Distinctive style from the popular adult animated sci-fi series
styleDescriptions.southPark: Simple, cut-out paper style animation with basic shapes and bold colors
styleDescriptions.naruto: Distinctive style from the popular anime series Naruto
styleDescriptions.onePiece: Distinctive style from the popular anime series One Piece
styleDescriptions.myLittlePony: Colorful and magical style inspired by the My Little Pony series, featuring vibrant characters and whimsical settings
styleDescriptions.actionFigure: Stylized 3D toy-like appearance with glossy finish and articulated features
styleDescriptions.figureInBox: Collectible figure style presented in packaging display box
styleDescriptions.sticker: Flat, vibrant art style with bold outlines perfect for stickers and decals
styleDescriptions.watercolor: Soft, translucent colors with gentle blending and artistic brush strokes
styleDescriptions.lineArt: Clean, monochromatic outlines with minimal or no fill colors
styleDescriptions.origamiPaperArt: Folded paper aesthetic with geometric shapes and clean edges
styleDescriptions.lego: Blocky, plastic brick aesthetic with signature Lego minifigure styling
styleDescriptions.lowPoly: Low-poly, blocky style with geometric shapes and clean edges
styleDescriptions.clay: Textured, handcrafted appearance similar to claymation or sculpted figures
styleDescriptions.pixelArt: Retro digital art style with visible pixels and limited color palettes
styleDescriptions.vaporwave: Vaporwave style with pastel colors and retro aesthetics
styleDescriptions.cyberpunk: Futuristic cyberpunk style with neon-lit environments and dark atmospheric mood
